title: @Riot There is a scam link sitting in top comments in the Patch 6.18 notes post
body:
Hello, hello~

Just figured I would point out the scam link that has been sitting near the top of the Patch 6.18 notes post in the news section so a Rioter could remove it or something.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-618-notes

Chances are a Rioter hasn't taken notice of this yet so I figured I would point it out as to prevent however many players from continuously clicking on it.

replies.body: I reported it on the Boards [post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/YE9Tszfh-patch-618-notes).  Hopefully the moderators will get it removed if enough report it.

It looks like it was taken care of before I got to this post. Thanks for taking the initiative to bring this to the attention of the community. I encourage you to continue reporting posts that are against the guidelines of the boards or are those pesky phishing links.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
